title: The Jurassic Park franchise : domestic and global box office revenue 2018
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Movies on X-axis for 2 groups North America, and Worldwide. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Box office gross in million USD.

In Movie Jurassic World, North America had the highest Box office gross in million USD 65227.0 among the 2 groups and in Jurassic Park III, Worldwide had the lowest Box office gross in million USD 3688.0.
Among all the Movies, North America had the highest Box office gross in million USD 65227.0 in Movie Jurassic World and lowest value 18117.0 in Movie Jurassic Park III.

The maximum Box office gross in million USD for North America that was found in Movie Jurassic World was 3.6 times larger than the minimum Box office gross in million USD observed in Movie Jurassic Park III.
yAxis: Box office gross in million USD
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Movies on X-axis for 2 groups North America, and Worldwide. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Box office gross in million USD.

Movie Jurassic World had the maximum Box office gross in million USD among all 2 groups, and it was for North America. The minimum Box office gross in million USD was observed in Movie Jurassic Park III for Worldwide.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Movies on X-axis for 2 groups North America, and Worldwide. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Box office gross in million USD.

In Movie Jurassic World, North America had the highest Box office gross in million USD 65227.0 among the 2 groups and in Jurassic Park III, Worldwide had the lowest Box office gross in million USD 3688.0.
Among all the Movies, North America had the highest Box office gross in million USD 65227.0 in Movie Jurassic World and lowest value 18117.0 in Movie Jurassic Park III.

The maximum Box office gross in million USD for North America that was found in Movie Jurassic World was 3.6 times larger than the minimum Box office gross in million USD observed in Movie Jurassic Park III.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Movies on X-axis for 2 groups North America, and Worldwide. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Box office gross in million USD.

In Movie Jurassic World, North America had the highest Box office gross in million USD 65227.0 among the 2 groups and in Jurassic Park III, Worldwide had the lowest Box office gross in million USD 3688.0.
In Movie Jurassic World, North America had the maximum Box office gross in million USD and it saw the lowest in Movie Jurassic Park III out of all 5 Movies.
There is a gap of 47110.0 between the highest and lowest Box office gross in million USD found for North America in Movie Jurassic World and Jurassic Park III.

Among the groups, North America had the biggest difference in Box office gross in million USD. Where the maximum Box office gross in million USD was 3.6 times larger than the minimum Box office gross in million USD.

On average, the Movie Jurassic World had the highest Box office gross in million USD for all 2 groups North America, and Worldwide. Whereas Jurassic Park III had the lowest average Box office gross in million USD.
